scope_of_work.problem: During the annual maintenance of the fire alarm system it was noted that one of the vesda panels had a system fault. The vendor technician attempted to correct it without any resolve and as such a new panel is required.
scope_of_work.scope: Vendor will be on site to replace the failed unit.
scope_of_work.justification: Unit is required to adequately monitor the air for smoke and act accordingly sending the information to the fire alarm panel which will then activate an alarm via the alarm panel.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Inability of the system to monitor air for smoke and alert the building occupants via fire alarm panel

scope_of_work.problem: Lower fan failure active on Mechanical UPS 610 series. Vendor advised to replace all fans due to "END OF LIFE" after 7 years of operation. This replacement will also prevent future UPS isolation for service if additional fans continue to fail

scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Mechanical UPS will maintain an active fault due to fan failure

project_name: UPM-2780441 - 275 Viger, Montreal - Relocation of Pomeroy team
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Maureen Gerlach (2):offer approved by Maureen Gerlach (3):offer submitted by Maureen Gerlach

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: After the closure of 200 Bouchard, the Pomeroy team have been working out of the back-up location which is not the ideal set-up for their work and future growth
scope_of_work.scope:
Relocation from current office # 200 to office # 659 on the ground floor. This also implies relocation existing users of room #659 to room# 630.
------------------------------------------
Reason for Upliftment (for RAS): In the initial submittal, requester had omitted to include the RAS hours by the local Team lead operator for submittal in the FSP tool and review of MOPS and RAMS for the electrical portion of this small job.
------------------------------------------
REASON FOR UPLIFTMENT:
1. Business unit now requires 9 additional network drops for Voice Solution (earlier there were 15 - now after addition the total will be 24) - vendor: The Plan Group

2. Work needs to be broken down in 2 days to ensure continuity of activity for the business unit. Therefore, a second visit is required to complete remaining work, without disrupting the service - vendor: EM Demenagement & Transport
scope_of_work.justification: To ensure a proper working space for the Pomeroy team and accessibility for reduced mobility users.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Request for new space will not be completed.

project_name: UPM-2790722 - 9672 279 ST, Acheson (WLDC) - AHS - Row 3 Cabinet 3 Cabinet replacement
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Maureen Gerlach (2):offer approved by Maureen Gerlach (3):offer submitted by Maureen Gerlach

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: The breakers and receptacles for grid location X104Y11 need to be validated or replaced with ones compatible for a 50 amp circuit. I believe the whips and breakers are compatible, but the receptacles are the wrong pinout for the new cabinet.
scope_of_work.scope:
Please verify the following:
1. The breakers support grid location X104Y11 are 50 amp
2. The whips supporting X104Y11 are sufficient for a 50 amp circuit.
3. Replace the existing the existing whips (if required) and receptacles at X104Y11 with the same receptacle type used for the rest of the cabinets in the AHS space. (Model to be confirmed)
scope_of_work.justification: AHS is installing a new APC cabinet and PDU's at X104Y11, existing infrastructure needs to be validated or modified to accommodate.
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect: Kyndryl would fail to provide the correct space and power requirements for the end client. This would certainly result in several escalation calls.

project_name: UPM-2768332 - 275 Viger, Changement d'adresse IP
status_history: here is the status change history of project in numbering order(1):billing completed by Sebastian Vandervort (2):work order closed by Sebastian Vandervort (3):work planning by Sebastian Vandervort (4):offer approved by Sebastian Vandervort (5):offer submitted by Sebastian Vandervort

scope_of_work.notes:
1. Does not include any client contingency 
2. Assumes that CBRE hold the burden of the actual cost whether it is over or under the quotation value 
3. Maintenance contract budget variations as a result of project activity will be funded by client through the eBVO process
scope_of_work.problem: Lors des travaux de remplacement des adresses IP la partie de Vigilant va être affecté donc la prèsencences d'un opérateur et le technicien de la compagnie Johnson contrôle pour ,mettre a jour les adresses dans Metasys
scope_of_work.scope:
You are being contacted because there will be work being performed at the Viger site on Saturday 5/7. AT&T will be moving much of their network equipment from the raised foor area to the AT&T room on the 3rd foor. We estimate the work will take the entire day and there 
will be an outage of 2 to 4 hours for certain applications. Core devices are redundant and will be moved one side at a time so there will be a minimal service disruption. The SDWAN equipment is already in the AT&T room so there will be no site outage except for the 
applications noted below. There will be no confguration changes to any equipment and the there will be no changes to the existing circuits. The affected applications with an outage are:
• Wireless
• Vigilant
• Total Connect / BTC – not an outage but a minimal service interruption.
• SNI – not an outage but a possible minimal service interruption.
scope_of_work.justification:
'opérateurs doit valider ;Quand on perd vigelant toutes les machines CRAH démarrons d’ où ou une gosse demande de refroidissement au niveau de chiller donc la perturbation de refroidissement , pour éviter la perturbation une présence d’un opérateur (avec un FSP) est 
obligatoire pour éviter la perturbation
La présence du technicien de JCI pour mettre a jour les adresses de NAE5 qui relie Vigilant
scope_of_work.non_approval_effect:
Perturbation au niveau de refroidissement rique pour le data centre
la communication entre vigeilant et metasys ne se fait pas
